creator: anthony@whitford.com
text:
Created attachment 33218
Makes GatherState a static inner class

Since GatherState does not need its parent SecureNio2Channel, the class can be made static to be leaner.

See http://findbugs.sourceforge.net/bugDescriptions.html#SIC_INNER_SHOULD_BE_STATIC

Hi,

Thanks for the report and the patch.
The fix is available in 8.0.x for 8.0.29 onwards

Regards,
Violeta
creator: violetagg@apache.org
